summary: $MMGA Tokenomics and How to Buy - Pepe is introducing $MMGA meme on Ethereum to reclaim the throne of memedom and restore greatness to Ethereum. The token has zero percent taxes and the mint option is revoked with 100% of LP burnt. The token has plans for different phases including MEME $MMGA, Vibe and HODL, and SWEET ALL DAY. It aims for partnerships, utility partnerships, multichain bridging, and T1 Exchange Listings. The token has over 10,000 holders and is focused on being a memecoin with graphics generated from the internet.
